message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding the right owner who will appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can arrange the details accordingly. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.
